content: वितंडा {@--1@} A captious objection, idle carping, a frivolous or fallacious argument or controversy (one of the sixteen {%padārthas%} or categories in Nyāya philosophy); स (जल्पः) प्रतिपक्षस्थापनाहीनो वितंडा <ls>Gaut. S.</ls> {@--2@} Wrangling, captious criticism in general. {@--3@} A spoon, ladle. {@--4@} Benzoin. {@--5@} The oleander plant.
